name: Pear Haroseth With Pecans and Figs
description: A recipe for chopped fruits and nuts, with wine and honey.
keywords: dairy-free, figs, pear, pecans, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 cup pecans, toasted and finely chopped
2 cups finely diced just-ripe unpeeled pears
1/2 cup peeled, finely diced, crisp and slightly tart apple
Zest and juice of half a lemon

recipeInstructions.text: In a glass or ceramic bowl, lightly toss the pecans, figs, pears and apple.
Add the cinnamon, honey, wine, lemon zest and juice. Toss lightly to blend well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.
